description: Ensures the contrast between foreground and background colors meets WCAG 2 AAA enhanced contrast ratio thresholds
help: Elements must meet enhanced color contrast ratio thresholds

any.message: Element has insufficient color contrast of 4.53 (foreground color: #7e7568, background color: #ffffff, font size: 15.0pt (20px), font weight: normal). Expected contrast ratio of 7:1

nodes.html: Verso, lower left, in pen and black ink, W.S. (mark of William Sharp); below that, encircled, B157; and in pencil, 63-3.67.
